#### Added by Bixal project scaffolding ####

# Ignore .env files as they are personal
/.env
/.lando.local.yml
# Ensure composer.log is NOT ignored.
!/composer.log
# Platform build directory for Lando.
/.platform/local
# Mount directories created for platform.sh
/tmp
/private
/.drush
/drush-backups
/.console
/var
# IDE settings
/.idea
/.vscode
# Databases
/*.sql
/*.sql.gz
/db/*.sql
/db/*.sql.gz
# Ignore directories generated by Composer
.gitattributes
/drush/contrib/
/vendor/
# Use https://theapache64.github.io/git-do-not-ignore/ in order to
# ignore all files created by drupal core except some some
# sub directories and files that need to be kept inside web.
# These are:
#/web/modules/custom
#/web/themes/custom
#/web/profiles/custom
#/web/sites/updated.development.services.yml
#/web/sites/updated.settings.local.php
#/web/sites/default/services.yml
#/web/sites/default/settings.php
#/web/sites/default/settings.platformsh.php
# Don't include !/
                #/*
# As that will ignore things at the top level that aren't added.
!/web/
/web/*
!/web/sites/
/web/sites/*
!/web/sites/updated.development.services.yml
!/web/sites/updated.settings.local.php
!/web/themes/
/web/themes/*
!/web/modules/
/web/modules/*
!/web/profiles/
/web/profiles/*
!/web/themes/custom
!/web/modules/custom
!/web/sites/default/
/web/sites/default/*
!/web/sites/default/services.yml
!/web/sites/default/settings.php
!/web/sites/default/settings.platformsh.php
!/web/profiles/custom
